Articles.Content:
found something cool:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0u7CWB40ezMx

r/c aircraft attempting takeoffs and landings on an advengers inspired r/c helicarrier. for science!
I think I read somewhere that the avenger's helicarrier will actually fly in reality at full size, but whatever underneath it will be obliterated.
Very cool stuff But personally, i think that drone with gimballed camera was even more awesome.

Great video, I notice that the red baron airplane had a lot more interference in the stadium, this of course was due all the other RC planes out there. But the gimballed camera quadrotor had no issues with interference. I bet it use higher frequencies.
